document_data.name: ''Vanguard's Banner''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''vanguard's banner''''' was an [[artifact]] from the frigid region of [[Icewind Dale]]m used to inspire combatants in battle.
document_data.Powers: The ''vanguard's banner'' was a crude gonfalon decorated with an image of an upright [[sword]]. Every friendly combatant was filled with inspiration and bravery, affected by the banner's quiet and deep power.
document_data.History: The ''vanguard's banner'' was in use in the late 15{{th}} century DR in the [[Ten-Towns]] during the ''[[black ice]]'' crisis of the {{YearlinkName|1485}}.
